    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static ArrayList<Movie> read()
        READ every row of Movie Database File If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Movie of every row of Movie Database File

      • readByTitle

        public static Movie readByTitle​(String title)
        READ and list all movies from Database with specified title
        Parameters:
        title - String of movie title
        Returns:
        Movie with specified title

      • create

        public static Boolean create​(Movie movie)
        CREATE new movie in database
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie to be added to database
        Returns:
        true if movie is successfully added to database, else false

      • update

        public static Boolean update​(Movie movie)
        UPDATE movie details in the database for a particular movie.
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie object to be updated.
        Returns:
        true if movie is updated successfully, else false.

      • updateStatusAll

        public static boolean updateStatusAll()
        UPDATE every row of Movie Database File with the latest status If Database file not found, ignore error and return empty list
        Returns:
        true if movie is updated successfully, else false.

      • delete

        public static Boolean delete​(Movie movie)
        DELETE a movie from Movie Database File
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie to be deleted from database
        Returns:
        true if movie is deleted successfully, else false.

      • deleteByTitle

        public static Boolean deleteByTitle​(String title)
        DELETE a movie from Movie Database File by title
        Parameters:
        title - String title of movie to be deleted from database
        Returns:
        true if movie is deleted successfully, else false.

      • updateSales

        public static void updateSales​(Movie movie,
                               int numTickets)
        UPDATE sales of a movie in Movie Database File
        Parameters:
        movie - Movie movie to be updated in database
        numTickets - Integer number of tickets sold
